title: 麻烦懂得老哥看一下
author: 千羽铭
txt_content:
Description: Exception ticking world

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:632)

Thread: Server thread

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content: 可能是偶发性bug，重启看看。
